abstract: Amy Wallace article describes how Lululemon Athletica founder Dennis Wilson, who resigned as chairman after public relations debacle, is planning final departure from the company as his family's new clothing line Kit and Ace seeks to compete with Lululemon.
lead_paragraph: Chip Wilson made billions selling the world’s most ubiquitous yoga pants. Then he insulted his customers and lost control of his company. Now he talks for the first time about his impending departure and his plans for his next venture.

headline.main: Chip Wilson, Lululemon Guru, Is Moving On

snippet: Chip Wilson made billions selling the world’s most ubiquitous yoga pants. Then he insulted his customers and lost control of his company. Now he talks for the first time about his impending departure and his plans for his next venture.
